comment.body:
> > 貌似 ci test error 还是会报错，这个 issue 目前解决的是哪块的 ci error 呢
> 
> 主要是解决本地运行测试不报错，但github ci环境运行不稳定的问题，目前还在解决中，这个pr只是用来测试的

也可以在自己fork的仓库给自己提pr测试CI，这样主仓库会干净一些😉

issue.title: feat(upload): add trigger to control upload list
issue.body:
现有的upload组件无法隐藏上传列表，加了一个showUploadList属性来控制上传列表的显隐，默认显示上传列表。
Fixes #4496

comment.body: 非常感谢你的贡献，原本已经有一个listType参数来控制列表类型的，这里不建议新增参数来控制显隐，建议添加一个 none 的枚举类型来控制。

review.body: 这是您为 Fusion/Next 提的第一个 pr，感谢您为 Fusion 做出的贡献，我们会尽快进行处理。

issue.title: [DatePicker]datepicker组件showTime属性传值问题
issue.body:
### Component 
DatePicker



### Steps to reproduce
场景：datepicker组件的showTime属性可以传timepicker的属性，且查阅timepicker的props的使用之后发现defaultValue可以传moment 对象或时间字符串
![图片](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/assets/100658615/3b896ac2-39be-4673-852b-877262974f40)
使用：
传moment对象时正常：
![图片](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/assets/100658615/4e0217be-722f-4232-95b6-e9178d950ca1)
传字符串时异常：
![图片](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/assets/100658615/ac87abc3-dab8-4510-ae71-43f13afd2063)
format要的是 时 : 秒，但是表现的是  时 : 分
经过实验，当showTime使用defaultValue时传moment对象时正常，传时间字符串时异常，只有HH，HH：mm，或者HH：mm：ss正常，其他形式比如mm：ss，HH：ss 等等形式表现皆异常


<!-- generated by alibaba-fusion-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->
<!-- component: DatePicker -->

issue.title: [CascaderSelect]CascaderSelect搜索后next-cascader-inner不自适应更新width
issue.body:
### Component 
CascaderSelect

### Reproduction link 
[https://done.alibaba-inc.com/dsm/pc/components/detail/cascaderselect?themeid=2&tabActiveKey=component#search-container](https://done.alibaba-inc.com/dsm/pc/components/detail/cascaderselect?themeid=2&tabActiveKey=component#search-container)

### Steps to reproduce
next-cascader-inner 的 width 之前是随着点击层级不一样，设置的值不一样的，但是搜索后清空，再点击就不自适应更新width了

issue.title: [Upload]upload组件上传文件后的文件列表可以关掉吗？
issue.body:
### Component 
Upload
### Feature Description
upload组件上传文件后，会弹出文件列表，可以不显示这个列表吗？

<!-- generated by alibaba-fusion-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->
<!-- component: Upload -->

comment.body: 暂时没有开放参数可以隐藏列表，如果是自定义程度较高的场景，我们建议使用Upload.Card来实现。如果实在不行，可以考虑使用css样式覆盖隐藏list。

issue.title: [Form]responsive模式下，device属性不起作用
issue.body:
### Component 
Form

### Reproduction link 
[![Edit on CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/static/img/play-codesandbox.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/fusion-next-template-forked-5vv7xy?file=/src/index.js)

### Steps to reproduce
FormItem的colSpan属性均为4，设置Form的responsive属性为true，device属性为phone，结果FormItem还是3个在一行，也就是device为默认的desktop。
然后去看了一下Form的源码,发现Form的device属性并没有传给内置的ResponsiveGrid

![form-source](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/assets/39897706/56debf41-d1f0-499e-afa4-2015d2967eeb)

<!-- generated by alibaba-fusion-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->
<!-- component: Form -->

comment.body:
> @lilithyang2018 你好，传递device需要使用ConfigProvider来设置

了解。 ConfigProvider是一种方案 但是Form的源码里即没有使用ConfigProvider 也没有像官网示例一样 直接传device

https://codepen.io/pen?&editors=0010

issue.title: [Form]responsive模式下，device属性不起作用
issue.body:
### Component

### Steps to reproduce
FormItem的colSpan属性均为4，设置Form的responsive属性为true，device属性为phone，结果FormItem还是3个在一行，也就是device为默认的desktop。
然后去看了一下Form的源码,发现Form的device属性并没有传给内置的ResponsiveGrid

issue.title: [Table]table组件scrollToRow功能滚动位置不准确
issue.body:
### Component Table ### Reproduction link [import { Table,Button } from '@alifd/next'; const dataSource = (j) => { const result = []; for (let i = 0; i < j; i ) { result.push({ title: {name: `Quotation for 1PCS Nano ${3 i}.0 controller compatible`}, id: `100306660940${i}`, time: 2000 i, index: i }); } return result; }; const render = (value, index, record) => { return Remove({record.id}); }; class App extends React.Component { state = { scrollToRow: 0 } onBodyScroll = (start) => { this.setState({ scrollToRow: start }); }; onClick100 = ()=>{ this.setState({ scrollToRow: 100 });}; onClick150 = ()=>{ this.setState({ scrollToRow: 150 }); }; render() { return (
); } } ReactDOM.render(, mountNode);](import { Table,Button } from '@alifd/next'; const dataSource = (j) => { const result = []; for (let i = 0; i < j; i ) { result.push({ title: {name: `Quotation for 1PCS Nano ${3 i}.0 controller compatible`}, id: `100306660940${i}`, time: 2000 i, index: i }); } return result; }; const render = (value, index, record) => { return Remove({record.id}); }; class App extends React.Component { state = { scrollToRow: 0 } onBodyScroll = (start) => { this.setState({ scrollToRow: start }); }; onClick100 = ()=>{ this.setState({ scrollToRow: 100 });}; onClick150 = ()=>{ this.setState({ scrollToRow: 150 }); }; render() { return (
); } } ReactDOM.render(, mountNode);) ### Steps to reproduce 重现代码在Riddle中可以直接使用， T点击按钮，able组件滚动到某100行之后，再往下拉到180行左右，再点击按钮滚到100行，位置不正确了，会偏移，甚至在页面上看不到滚动到的位置。

comment.body: @deepdeepstudy 你的重现代码复制出来不可用，可以直接给个riddle链接吗

issue.title: [Table]Tab组件下使用拖拽可编辑表格报错
issue.body:
### Component 
Table



### Steps to reproduce
使用Tab组件时，unmountInactiveTabs默认为false。有个2个Tab.Item子组件，每个Tab.Item下使用了拖拽表格。点击切换Tab时，会报 Cannot have two HTML5 backends at the same time.错误。
大致代码结构：

<Tab unmountInactiveTabs={false}>
      <Tab.Item title="表格" key="table">
          <SortableTableComponent />
      </Tab.Item>
      <Tab.Item title="Documentation" key="search">
          <SortableTableComponent />
      </Tab.Item>
</Tab>

交互图：
![image](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/assets/24415457/3ed8524f-3744-4f1f-b4f9-caa856984a23)
报错文案：
![image](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/assets/24415457/69a3fe37-78ed-4fa7-a06c-a5ce619be295)


<!-- generated by alibaba-fusion-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->
<!-- component: Table -->

comment.body: 你好 @ming001，由于缺乏必要的信息（如 bug 重现步骤、复现 demo 等），无法定位问题。请补充相应的信息以帮助我们更快地定位问题。复现 demo 可以是 [codesandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/kmy7zjr7l3) 或 [codepen](https://codepen.io/pen?&editors=0010) 或是 GitHub 仓库的链接。在相关 label 移除之前，由于无法快速跟进我们将降低处理的优先级。

release.name: build/1.26.28
release.body:
## [1.26.28](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/compare/1.26.26...1.26.28) (2023-10-25)
### Bug Fixes
* **CascaderSelect:** a typesetting error occurred while being at the … ([#4455](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4455)) ([6d98078](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/6d98078))
* **DatePicker2:** change inputValue when only mode changes ([#4486](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4486)) ([ff392f1](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/ff392f1))
* **Dialog:** in case of overlay is empty, close [#4333](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4333) ([#4475](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4475)) ([d912527](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/d912527))
* **Dialog2:** clear warning by ConfigProvider cross ref props with no forwardRef component ([d017934](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/d017934))
* **Field:** field props rules should be immutable, close [#4367](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4367) ([#4479](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4479)) ([3919d50](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/3919d50))
* **NumberPicker:** fix minimum value on initialization ([#4477](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4477)) ([9de2dbd](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/9de2dbd))
* **Select:** can infinite scroll when useVirtual, close [#4175](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4175) ([#4476](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4476)) ([8d0b263](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/8d0b263))
* **Table:** error when columns is undefined, close [#4070](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4070) ([#4474](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4474)) ([b1f504c](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/b1f504c))
### Features
* **Radio:** add focus support for RadioGroup ([#4465](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4465)) ([66d06c9](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/66d06c9))
* **TreeSelect:** support special valueRender, close [#4464](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4464) ([#4470](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/issues/4470)) ([9aa17b6](https://github.com/alibaba-fusion/next/commit/9aa17b6))
release.short_description_html:
1.26.28 (2023-10-25)

Bug Fixes

  • CascaderSelect: a typesetting error occurred while being at the … (#4455) (6d98078)
  • DatePicker2: change inputValue when only mode changes (#4486) (ff392f1)
  • Dialog: i…

payload.description: 🦍 A configurable component library for web built on React.

commits.message:
feat(Radio): add focus support for RadioGroup (#4465)

Co-authored-by: 周鲂 <jiangqi.jiangqi@alibaba-inc.com>
fix(Dialog2): clear warning by ConfigProvider cross ref props with no forwardRef component

fix(NumberPicker): fix minimum value on initialization (#4477)

Co-authored-by: chenkeyao.chenkeya <chenkeyao.chenkeya@alibaba-inc.com>
fix(Slider):fade and switch to flicker  close #4292 (#4469)

fix(DatePicker2): change inputValue when only mode changes (#4486)

Co-authored-by: chenkeyao.chenkeya <chenkeyao.chenkeya@alibaba-inc.com>

fix(Field): field props rules should be immutable, close #4367 (#4479)

upgrade @alifd/field to ~1.6.3
fix(Table): error when columns is undefined, close #4070 (#4474)
fix(Dialog): in case of overlay is empty, close #4333 (#4475)
fix(Select): can infinite scroll when useVirtual, close #4175 (#4476)

fix(CascaderSelect): a typesetting error occurred while being at the … (#4455)

* fix(Cascader): store dom ref separately

---------

Co-authored-by: 珵之 <chengzhi.zpc@alibaba-inc.com>

fix/(Slider): transform error #close 4302 (#4487)

* fix/(Slider): transform error #close 4302

* fix/(Slider): transform error close #4302

* fix(Slider): slider transform test close #4302
chore(BuildTool): set spawn stdio default value to inherit

payload.description: 🦍 A configurable component library for web built on React.
